#include <cstdio>

int main()
{
    int testCases, cap;
    int man, wom, chd;
    int solMan, solWom, solChd;
    int m, w, c, j, max, adults;

    scanf("%d", &testCases);
    while(testCases-- > 0)
    {
        scanf("%d%d%d%d", &cap, &man, &wom, &chd);
        solMan = solWom = solChd = max = 0;
        for (m = 1, w = 1; m <= man; m++)
        {
            w -= 1;
            for(; ( w <= wom ) && (w <= 2 * m); w++)
            {
                adults = m + w;
                if ( 4 * adults > chd )
                    c = chd;
                else
                    c = 4 * adults;

                if ( adults + c > cap)
                    c = cap - adults;

                if ( adults + c > max)
                {
                    solMan = m;
                    solWom = w;
                    solChd = c;
                    max = m + w + c;
                }
            }
        }
        printf("%d %d %d\n", solMan, solWom, solChd);
    }
    return 0;
}
